cards.title: Baccarat
powers: Discard the top card of your deck or put up to 2 trick cards with the same name from your trash into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: Put 2 cards from a trash on the bottom of their deck.
Increase the next damage dealt by a hero target by 2.
Each hero character may deal themselves 3 toxic damage to use a power now.

openingLines.default: Some players don't know when to fold.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Cheating is such an ugly word. True, but ugly.

cards.title: Abyssal Solitaire
cards.body: Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to {Baccarat} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Why play a game{BR}if you can't beat somebody?

cards.title: Ace In The Hole
body: You may use {Baccarat}'s innate power twice during your power phase this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Some things, you can't take{BR}with you. Others, you never lose.

cards.title: Ace Of Saints
body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
At the start of your turn, shuffle 2 cards with the same name from your trash into your deck or this card is destroyed.

flavorQuotes.text: Cannot detect specimen's origin.{BR}Celestial? Primordial? Further research{BR}required.

cards.title: Ace Of Sinners
body: Increase damage dealt by hero targets by 1.
At the start of your turn, shuffle 2 cards with the same name from your trash into your deck or this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: Havoc Handed the card back.{BR}“It's a pretty small weapon.”{BR}“'Tis not a weapon. 'Tis a coupon{BR}for victory.”

cards.title: Afterlife Euchre
cards.body: Increase the next damage dealt by {Baccarat} by 1, or {Baccarat} deals 1 target 2 toxic damage.

cards.title: "All In"
cards.body: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, {Baccarat} deals each non-hero target 1 infernal damage and 1 radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Heaven and hell don't{BR}hold back. Neither shall I.

cards.title: Bring Down The House
body: Shuffle any number of pairs of cards with the same name from your trash into your deck.
You may destroy up to X ongoing or environment cards, where X is the number of pairs you shuffled this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Does it matter what it's called? Just keep doing it!

cards.title: Cheap Trick
body: Discard the top card of your deck.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a trick. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck and put the trick into play.

flavorQuotes.text: For a guy with no sleeves, he{BR}has a lot of tricks up them.

cards.title: Graveyard Bridge
body: You may shuffle a card from your trash into your deck. If you do, put a card with the same name from your trash into play.
Shuffle all copies of that card from your trash into your deck.
cards.flavorText: Baccarat grinned through what{BR}remained of his lips. “Shall we play{BR}again?”

cards.title: "I Fold"
cards.body: Discard your hand and draw 3 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Don't worry. His luck{BR}improves the second time around.

cards.title: Underworld Hold 'Em
cards.body: One player may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Explain it one more time. When you{BR}say, 'hit me,' you don't mean literally?

cards.flavorReference: Haka, The Book of the Dead #721

promoCards.title: Baccarat
powers: Play X copies of Afterlife Euchre from your trash (up to 3). Discard the top 3-X cards of your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a card in a trash. Destroy a card in play with the same name.
One target deals itself 1 energy damage.
Each hero character may deal themselves 1 toxic damage to draw a card now.

openingLines.default: Let me show you a card trick.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Alright, heads up, kiddies - this one is between me and the cuckoo in the clock.

promoCards.title: Baccarat
powers: Play any number of tricks from your hand, or put 2 tricks from your trash into your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may shuffle a card from their trash into their deck, then put all cards with the same name from their trash into their hand.
Each hero character may deal themselves 3 toxic damage to play a card now.

openingLines.default: Fate is not going to be kind to you today.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Fate! It's been too long - and yet somehow not long enough.

promoCards.title: Baccarat
powers: Play or draw a card. If you played a trick this way, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
One player may use a power now.
One player may draw a card now.

openingLines.default: You shouldn't show your hand before the game even starts.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Oh, you again? I won these cards fair and square in our first meeting!
openingLines.PastTheRamCharacter: You're a traitor and a thief. And your fate just caught up with you!
